sentences.english: Unique Korg feature lets you tune down to 5 semitones flat.
sentences.chinese: Korg的独特功能可让您调整到5个半音持平。

sentences.english: It is perhaps easier to play some notes on the Chromatic than it is on the 10 hole harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 也许在半音阶口琴上更容易去吹奏某些音符。

sentences.english: Music raised in pitch by one chromatic semitone .
This tuning is achieved when all the strings are flattened by a half step.
sentences.chinese: 此调弦是将所有的弦降一个半音。

sentences.english: You can water except the chromatic harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 除了半音阶口琴，其余的都可以洗。

sentences.english: Thus a dotted half note or minim is equal in length to three quarter notes or crotchets.
sentences.chinese: 半音加符点，时值等于三个四分音符。

sentences.english: They are needed when chromatic notes foreign to the key and not indicated in the key-signature occur.
sentences.chinese: 当半音不属于该调，并且无调号时需要加变音记号。

sentences.english: Entire compositions are rarely written in the chromatic scale.
sentences.chinese: 在音乐作品中，很少有作品是用半音阶写成的。

sentences.english: Great visual feed-back with semitone snap, and actual pitch indicator.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的视觉饲料回半音管理单元，和实际音高的指标。

sentences.english: The relationship of adjacent notes in all the previous scales is a whole-step or half-step.
sentences.chinese: 从以前的标准看相邻音之间的关系是一个全音或半音。

sentences.english: However the Chromatic harmonica is a much more complex instrument to learn than the 10 hole harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 然而，半音阶口琴比十孔口琴更为复杂。

sentences.english: In this issue, I would like to discuss about the methods to test a chromatic harmonica.
sentences.chinese: 在这期杂志中，我想来探讨测试半音阶口琴的方法。

sentences.english: Full range adjustments from one semitone to an octave up or down.
sentences.chinese: 全方位的调整，从一个半音，以一个八度向上或向下。
